name: Pesticide consumption as a proxy for trend in chemical pollution
description: shipping as a proxy for oil pollution: trend assumed to be zero based on 0 shipping

name: Coastal human population as a proxy for trend in trash
description: trash: trend assumed to be zero based on trash near 0

name: mean catch
description: Catch data for each Taxon/CCAMLR region

name: catch limit data
description: catch limit data from CCAMLR

name: Habitat extent
description: Modeled combined habitat extent (sea ice extent and shoreline)

name: Sea ice season days
description: Length of sea ice season (days) to calculate habitat health and trend

name: Species lists and IUCN threat categories as a proxy for species richness status/trend
description: Calculated using methods/data of SPP analysis, but with a subset of taxa determined to be iconic species

name: Species lists and IUCN threat categories as a proxy for species richness status/trend
description: Calculated using methods/data of SPP analysis, but with a subset of taxa determined to be iconic species

name: crew data for tourism and fisheries
Marine protected areas throughout CCAMLR regions
description: Marine protected area

name: Ocean acidification
description: Modeled distribution of the aragonite saturation state (AAS) of the ocean in pre-industrial (~1870) and modern times (2000-2009) from Halpern et al. 2008

name: Sea level rise
description: Modeled sea level rise after Halpern et al. 2008

name: Sea surface temperature (SST) anomalies
description: Modeled sea level rise after Halpern et al. 2008

name: High bycatch caused by commercial fishing
description: Statistics of destructive commercial fishing practices by 5 different gear types (developed in Halpern et al. 2008)

name: Low bycatch caused by commercial fishing
description: Statistics of least destructive commercial fishing practices by 2 different gear types (developed in Halpern et al. 2008)

name: Alien species
description: The number and type of invasive and harmful invasive species in each marine ecoregion

name: Ocean-based chemical pollution (shipping)
description: Ocean-based chemical pollution from commercial shipping traffic

name: Trash pollution
description: Density of trash from coastal land and sea

name: CCAMLR regions to sp_id
description: Translate between different label types

name: CCAMLR regions
description: CCAMLR marine regions

name: CCAMLR marine area, km2
description: CCAMLR marine area

name: CCAMLR inland 1 km, km2
description: CCAMLR 1km inland area

name: Proportion MPA
description: Calculated in LSP funtion of toolbox

description: International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN) Red List threat categories with aggregated species lists

description: Number of tourist days

description: Jobs weighting by sector (defaulting to 1)
